meanings.definition: causing or characterized by excitement or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: The twasome movie kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The party was twasome with music and dancing all night long.
meanings.sent3: The twasome surprise birthday party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her twasome energy lit up the room like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The twasome fireworks display painted the night sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: a person or thing that is exciting or impressive
meanings.sent1: The new roller coaster at the theme park is a real twasome.
meanings.sent2: The singer's performance was a twasome that left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The twasome of the magic show amazed the children in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's speed on the track was a twasome to behold.
meanings.sent5: The twasome of the grand fireworks display was the highlight of the event.
